name: Service on beneficiary
text:
§653-9  Service on beneficiary.  Service of process upon the beneficiary may be made as has been usual or shall be provided in the case of civil actions in general. [L 1890, c 50, §7; RL 1925, §2852; RL 1935, §4298; RL 1945, §10329; RL 1955, §238-9; HRS §653-9]
 
Case Notes
 
  Cited:  34 H. 328, 330 (1937).
